summary.span: 在 Common Language Runtime 開始搜尋事件處理常式之前，為第一次發生 Managed 例外狀況時所引發的通知事件提供相關資料。

span.span: Provides data for the notification event that is raised when a managed exception first occurs, before the common language runtime begins searching for event handlers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會提供例外狀況處理常式具有存取權的例外狀況的事件。This class provides the exception handler for the event with access to the exception. ## Examples 下列範例會建立名為應用程式定義域的一系列`Child_0`透過`Child_3`，與`Worker`每個應用程式定義域中的物件。The following example creates a series of application domains named `Child_0` through `Child_3`, with a `Worker` object in each application domain. 每個`Worker`物件具有參考`Worker`物件中下一個應用程式定義域中，除了`Worker`最後一個應用程式定義域中。Each `Worker` object has a reference to the `Worker` object in the next application domain, except for the `Worker` in the last application domain. 以外的所有應用程式網域中處理事件`Child_1`。The event is handled in all application domains except `Child_1`. 預設應用程式定義域時已建立應用程式定義域，呼叫`TestException`方法的第一個子應用程式定義域。When the application domains have been created, the default application domain calls the `TestException` method for the first child application domain. 每個`Worker`物件會呼叫`TestException`方法下一步，直到最後一個`Worker`擲回的例外狀況處理，或未處理的。Each `Worker` object calls the `TestException` method for the next, until the last `Worker` throws an exception that is either handled or unhandled. 因此，目前的執行緒通過所有應用程式定義域，並`TestException`加入至每個應用程式定義域中的堆疊。Thus, the current thread passes through all the application domains, and `TestException` is added to the stack in each application domain. 當最後一個`Worker`物件會處理例外狀況，只有在最後一個應用程式定義域引發事件。When the last `Worker` object handles the exception, the event is raised only in the last application domain. 其他應用程式定義域永遠不會有機會處理例外狀況，因此不會引發事件。The other application domains never get a chance to handle the exception, so the event is not raised. 當最後一個`Worker`物件不會處理例外狀況，每個應用程式定義域中具有事件處理常式就會引發事件。When the last `Worker` object does not handle the exception, the event is raised in each application domain that has an event handler. 每個事件處理常式已完成之後，會繼續堆疊回溯直到預設應用程式定義域攔截例外狀況。After each event handler has finished, the stack continues to unwind until the exception is caught by the default application domain. > [!NOTE] > 若要查看如何堆疊顯示隨著接近引發事件並使其更接近預設應用程式定義域，變更`e.Exception.Message`至`e.Exception`中`FirstChanceHandler`事件處理常式。To see how the stack display grows as the event is raised closer and closer to the default application domain, change `e.Exception.Message` to `e.Exception` in the `FirstChanceHandler` event handlers. 請注意，當`TestException`稱為跨應用程式網域界限，會出現兩次： 一次來進行 proxy 和虛設常式一次。Notice that when `TestException` is called across application domain boundaries, it appears twice: once for the proxy and once for the stub.
